EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, WRiK Anti-Bullying Squad Details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey Grads,
Thanks for signing up to to Wandsworth, Richmond and Kingston's Anti-Bullying Squad! This email will let you know all the details for the day and what you need to bring.
Being part of the #Anti-BullyingSquad, you will be creatively campaigning in Kingston to spread the word against bullying! This day will consist of creative petitioning, including paint and pledges and engaging with members of the public!
Being involved in this social action project means you have earned free tickets for the NCS Action Day celebration event taking place in Conway Hall after your project from 4pm to 8pm! You will be travelling from Kingston to Conway Hall with your mentor.
This project will take place between 11am to 3pm. Everyone will be meeting at Kingston station at 10:45am and the project will be happening outside HSBC at 11am on Clarence Street.
Please bring your oysters and some money to put on them as you will be travelling from Kingston to Holborn for the celebration event.
Address: 54 Clarence St, Kingston upon Thames, Greater London KT1 1NP
You will have 2 mentors on the day. Indie - 07469151448 Stephen - 07895825100
These are the numbers you can contact on the day if you need to. If you have any questions regarding the day please free feel to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org
Looking forward to seeing you all there!
The Core Grad Team
